original_title: The Inner Life of Exterior Plants
overview: Within a banana plantation and a botanic garden, a panel of botanic experts are challenged to discuss contemporary trends in gardening, scientific classification, and monocultural crops by an astute interviewer. The hidden politics of the expertsâ€™ positions are uncomfortably exposed and confronted with reality, as they render themselves suspicious of their own language.
title: The Inner Life of Exterior Plants
